channel.title: VisageScape(718) this is a learning project please dont flame guys :(
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]VisageScape 718[/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]WebSite: http://visagescape718.webs.com/[/size][/center]
[center] We guarentee you will: -Find yourself being able to level all skills. Every skill is fully working (Wilderness Agility as well for example). -Have an awesome time within our active community and staff.
Server features We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short: -Worldwide skilling (And a member skill island) -Active Pking all around the server -Plenty of bosses in wilderness and non wilderness -Castle Wars -Double Xp weekends -::train area for beginner training -Fight pits for fun dueling -Bonfire -Mining -Thieving stalls -Cooking -Firemaking -GemCutting -Herblore -HomeTeleport -Player Follow -Rest -Summoning -Woodcutting -Interfaces manager -Tasks system -Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc) -Controlers system -Poison WORKING ON SELLING AND BUYING GE 100% -Gaming to the max
We stand for quality, we have and always will. We try to minimize the downtime and create a lagg free environment. With all skills fully working and a completely re-designed combat system which is one of the most accurate out there to this day, we are happy to say that our players love VisageScape. With the daily compliments we get ingame and on the forums, and with the suggestions posted, we keep Visagescape growing and holding weekly updates. http://visagescape.site50.net[/center]
[center][size=12pt]Agility![/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/2d8177dd0dd418c50016a4477efc1160.png[/img]
[center][size=14pt]Working Interfaces![/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/2fdf7641f7a11e6a5a6e0d51b611ffee.png[/img]
[center][size=12pt]ALL CUSTOM RUNESPAN![/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/7518d638a531c8c7a65e71eb2d6ffdba.png[/img]
[center][size=14pt](SICK TELEPORT) :P [/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/00021a2f9834a31fd43ee595d10346d1.png[/img]
[center][size=18pt]YES ALL SKILLS ARE 100% TRAINABLE (QUICK XP RATES)[/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/1a860f8afb83953e4f99c766be985e34.png[/img]
[center][size=14pt]DUNG! (Note: Not added by me)[/size][/center]
[img]http://i1144.photobucket.com/albums/o490/supremesmack/5b61aa08dc488f7301ab496ad7823530.png[/img]

item.title: VisageScape(718) this is a learning project please dont flame guys :(
item.dc:creator: @supremesmack supremesmack
item.description:
@supremesmack wrote:

[center][size=36pt]VisageScape 718[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]WebSite: http://visagescape718.webs.com/[/size][/center]

[center]
We guarentee you will:
-Find yourself being able to level all skills. Every skill is fully working (Wilderness Agility as well for example).
-Have an awesome time within our active community and staff.

Server features
We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short:
-Worldwide skilling (And a member skill island)
-Active Pking all around the server
-Plenty of bosses in wilderness and non wilderness
-Castle Wars
-Double Xp weekends
-::train area for beginner training
-Fight pits for fun dueling
-Bonfire
-Mining
-Thieving stalls
-Cooking
-Firemaking
-GemCutting
-Herblore
-HomeTeleport
-Player Follow
-Rest
-Summoning
-Woodcutting
-Interfaces manager
-Tasks system
-Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc)
-Controlers system
-Poison
WORKING ON SELLING AND BUYING GE 100%
-Gaming to the max

We stand for quality, we have and always will. We try to minimize the downtime and create a lagg free environment. With all skills fully working and a completely re-designed combat system which is one of the most accurate out there to this day, we are happy to say that our players love VisageScape. With the daily compliments we get ingame and on the forums, and with the suggestions posted, we keep Visagescape growing and holding weekly updates.
http://visagescape.site50.net[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Agility![/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Working Interfaces![/size][/center]

00021a2f9834a31fd43ee595d10346d1.png342×606

[center][size=18pt]YES ALL SKILLS ARE 100% TRAINABLE (QUICK XP RATES)[/size][/center]

5b61aa08dc488f7301ab496ad7823530.png1024×708
